Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Score Description
1 Limber 4 Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.
20 Imposter 9 The Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon it's facing.
40 Mimicry 3 Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.
60 Super Luck 5 The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.
80 Color Change 2 The Pokémon's type becomes the type of the move used on it.

  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Bland Skin -4 Halves the Pokémon's Sp. Def stat.
Color Change 2 The Pokémon's type becomes the type of the move used on it.
High Entropy 5 Boosts the Pokémon's Evasiveness under Gravity.
Imperious -6 This Pokémon sometimes refuses to obey its Trainer.
Imposter 9 The Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon it's facing.
Inflexible -3 This Pokémon can only use the first move it uses in battle.
Mimicry 3 Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.
